_header: Saint Lucy the maiden clean and good
_description: Life of St. Lucy (version in short lines)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saynt Lucy þe maiden clene and gudeWas getyn and born of gentil blude…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Saint lucy in heuyn has hir medevnto þat life oure lord vs lede
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De sancta Lucia Virgine historia (rubric, f. 138rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 17-19.
